author: iswanson@thehill.com (Nathaniel Weixel)
title: Cuomo says 'worst is over' as NY deaths cross 10,000
description: More than 10,000 people have died from COVID-19 in New York, but Gov. Andrew Cuomo (D) said "the worst is over."During his daily press briefing, Cuomo said the state has controlled the spread of the virus, but warned that could change if people let...
content: More than 10,000 people have died from COVID-19 in New York, but Gov. Andrew CuomoAndrew CuomoCuomo says he wants New York 'to reopen as soon as possible'De Blasio told Cuomo of decision to keep NYC schools shut in last-minute text: reportCoronavirus response… [+594 chars]
